name: Facebook chat emoticons revamp v1.1
description: Replace emoticons in facebook chat with more simple yet more perfect (imho).
additional_info:
*v1.1*
— Slightly improved emoticons.
— Changed Image URL to Data URL so script doesn't need any server to get image from and image loads instanty.
— Added «Licensed under CC by-nc-sa 3.0».
— Added before & after images.
*v1.0*
— Initial release
